Shopify Media Review Grid Section

Learn how to create a Media Review Grid section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Media Review Grid section allows you to create a visually appealing grid layout for customer reviews, featuring both images and videos. This section is customizable to fit the aesthetic of your Shopify store, providing options to adjust fonts, colors, and layout dimensions. It also includes functionality for autoplay slides on mobile devices and various options for display settings, making it versatile and dynamic.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Media Review Grid"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-Commerce Store

  1. Product Reviews: Showcase customer reviews for products with compelling images and videos, helping to build trust and convince new visitors to make a purchase.
  2. Testimonials: Use the grid to display testimonials from satisfied customers, highlighting different aspects of their experience with your store.
  3. User-Generated Content: Collect and display user-generated content, such as images and videos, from social media, showing products in real-life scenarios.
  4. Marketing Campaigns: Create a section dedicated to campaign reviews or seasonal promotions with specific images and videos to drive conversion.
  5. Brand Story: Use the section to tell the story of your brand through customer experiences, emphasizing the connection and community around your products.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  1. Font Settings:

    • Text Font
    • Headline Font
    • Text Size
    • Line Height (for both text and headline)
    • Text Color
    • Headline Color

  2. Color Settings:

    • Background
    • Review Background
    • Highlight Color
    • Button Background and Text Color

  3. Button Style:

    • Padding Top/Bottom and Left/Right
    • Round Borders on Button

  4. Dimensions:

    • Media Aspect Ratio
    • Max Width of Section
    • Gap Between Reviews
    • Padding (Top, Bottom, Left, Right)

  5. Advanced:

    • Mobile Display (Slideshow or Stacked)
    • Columns for Mobile Display (when stacked)
    • Slideshow Progress Background and Foreground Color
    • Slideshow Indicator Color
    • Enable Autoplay and Autoplay Time
    • Show Big Play Button
    • Round Borders on Media
    • Subtle Shadow on Media
